title: /ALL Chat | It’s Ekko Time! Ft. Moobeat

replies.body: I don't see whats wrong with auto locking if you own the champion(s) and you select him your only waiting for like 60 seconds before he/she is auto locked in so as far as I'm concerned if you pick the champion before anyone else and instalock and if anyone curses at you just say read the rules, because there is nothing wrong with auto-locking in.
